CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Tariff Negotiations relative to Political Disruptions?
SRP.A: Tariff Negotiations is {below} Political Disruptions in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Political Disruptions relative to Tariff Negotiations?
SRP.A: Political Disruptions is {above} Tariff Negotiations in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Customs Clearance relative to Tariff Negotiations?
SRP.A: Customs Clearance is {below} Tariff Negotiations in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total cross-border delays?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Political Disruptions}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total cross-border delays?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Tariff Negotiations}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Political Disruptions's maximum Cross-Border Delays in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Political Disruptions's maximum Cross-Border Delays is in {1955}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Customs Clearance's maximum Cross-Border Delays in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Customs Clearance's maximum Cross-Border Delays is in {1962}.

NC.Q: Between 1961 and 1963, did the total Cross-Border Delays experience a larger or smaller change than between 1959 and 1962?
NC.A: The change in total cross-border delays between 1961 and 1963 was {smaller} than between 1959 and 1962.

NC.Q: Was the total Cross-Border Delays in 1962 higher or lower than in 1964?
NC.A: The total cross-border delays in 1962 was {higher} than in 1964.

NC.Q: Between 1957 and 1962, was the average total Cross-Border Delays higher or lower than between 1955 and 1956?
NC.A: The average total cross-border delays between 1957 and 1962 was {lower} than between 1955 and 1956.

NC.Q: Between 1962 and 1963, did the total Cross-Border Delays experience a larger or smaller change than between 1960 and 1962?
NC.A: The change in total cross-border delays between 1962 and 1963 was {smaller} than between 1960 and 1962.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Political Disruptions} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Customs Clearance and Tariff Negotiations first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Customs Clearance and Tariff Negotiations first exchanged leading positions in {1956}.
